main event: Multiple observations of unidentified flying objects reported at Alexandria AFB, LA on November 17, 1954.
interesting points: The sightings included reports of round, multi-colored lights that appeared small,The length of observation was noted to be 25 minutes plus,One pilot stated that an object followed him during his route,Observers utilized binoculars to see glowing effects from the objects,Local analysis concluded the objects were probably astronomical phenomena.
witness description: Civilians and military personnel at the base
